Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

AS A REDSHIRT SENIOR (2023-24)

Fifth-year guard who was fourth on the team in minutes played, (727)…averaged 6.8 points per game in his 32 appearances…made 23 starts…scored in double figures in nine contests…second on the team in three-point percentage with a .351 mark…scored a season-high 21 points at South Carlina State on Dec. 11, had a conference-season-best 17 points at Lipscomb Feb. 3, shot 4-6 from three in that same game…recorded 21 steasl on the season and four blocks

AS A REDSHIRT-JUNIOR (2022-23)

Played in 21 of 29 games, starting five...missed time at the beginning of ASUN Conference play due to a shoulder injury suffered against Notre Dame on Dec. 27...scored a season-high 12 points on four made three-pointers, also a season-high, at Lipscomb on Feb. 18...scored in double-figures five times...grabbed five rebounds two different times...season-high 32 minutes played in a win over Charleston Southern on Dec. 17...made three or more three-pointers six times

AT NORTH DAKOTA STATE (2018-22)

2021-22 Season (Junior): Played in 32 of 33 games, starting all 32 … Ranked fifth on the Bison with 8.5 points per game … Made 46 three-pointers, second-most on the team, at a 40-percent clip … Scored a season-high 17 points twice – vs. Tarleton State on Nov. 22 and at Montana State on Dec. 7 … Drained a career-high five three-pointers vs. Tarleton.

2018-19 Season (Freshman): Played in 18 games and made 3 starts as a true freshman … Averaged 3.4 points and 1.1 rebounds per game … Scored a season-high 10 points at East Tennessee State on Nov. 24 … In two games against No. 1-ranked teams, he averaged 6.5 points, scoring 7 at Gonzaga on Nov. 26 and 6 against Duke in the NCAA Tournament … Season-high 6 rebounds vs. Northland College on Dec. 19.

PERSONAL

Son of Kim and John Cook...Enjoys watching football, golfing, and listening to music
